0.text: Innate: Rengar generates 1 Ferocity whenever he casts a basic ability or uses  Savagery's first attack. Reaching 4 Ferocity renders his next basic ability empowered, granting an additional cast along with 30 / 40 / 50% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds at the cost of consuming all Ferocity. Reaching 4 Ferocity with  Savagery or  Bola Strike locks its empowered version from use for 0.1 seconds before and after casting it. All Ferocity is lost after being out of combat for 8 seconds.

1.text: While in  brush, Rengar's basic attacks have massively increased range and cause him to  leap to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal  melee range. This effect lingers for 0.25 seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if Rengar casts  Flash or  Hexflash to do so. Leaping with 0 Ferocity generates 1 Ferocity.

2.text: Innate - Bonetooth Necklace:  Takedowns on enemy champions within 1.5 seconds of being damaged by Rengar grant him a Trophy per unique champion, up to 5. An  additional one is made available through the event The Hunt is On! Trophies grant 1% − 36% (based on  trophies) bonus AD as  bonus attack damage.

0.text: Active: Rengar's next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain  40% bonus attack speed, with the first also having an  uncancelable windup, gaining  25 bonus range and dealing bonus physical damage.

1.text: Empowered Active: Savagery's bonus physical damage is modified and grants Rengar 50% − 101% (based on level)  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

2.text: Savagery  resets Rengar's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: Rengar stores 50% of the post-mitigation damage he has taken in the last 1.5 seconds as grey health on his health bar, increased to 100% of damage taken from  monsters.

1.text: Active: Rengar lets out a battle roar, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and 65 − 130 (based on level) bonus magic damage to  monsters, and  healing himself for the amount of grey health.

2.text: Empowered Active: Battle Roar's magic damage is modified and additionally  cleanses Rengar of all  crowd control.

0.text: Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them for 1.75 seconds.

1.text: Empowered Active: Bola Strike's physical damage is modified and  roots its target for 1.75 seconds.

0.text: Active: Rengar activates his predatory instincts,  revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius and gaining  bonus movement speed for a duration.

1.text: After 2 seconds, he also becomes  camouflaged and gains  Unseen Predator for the remaining duration. His next basic attack within normal attack range against any enemy unit or with Unseen Predator against the nearest enemy champion deals 50% AD bonus physical damage and  reduces the target's armor for 4 seconds.

2.text: The nearest enemy champion to Rengar alerts all of their allies within 1200 range about his presence, and they can sense him at 1600 range.

3.text: Attacking or casting abilities, though not  Savagery, ends Thrill of the Hunt immediately.

4.text: Enemy champions spotted by Thrill of the Hunt stay  revealed within Rengar's reveal range while the stealth persists.

1.concerningText: Active: Rengar's next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain  40% bonus attack speed, with the first also having an  uncancelable windup, gaining  25 bonus range and dealing bonus physical damage.
Empowered Active: Savagery's bonus physical damage is modified and grants Rengar 50% − 101% (based on level)  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

3.concerningText: Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them for 1.75 seconds.
Empowered Active: Bola Strike's physical damage is modified and  roots its target for 1.75 seconds.

4.concerningText: Active: Rengar activates his predatory instincts,  revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius and gaining  bonus movement speed for a duration.

After 2 seconds, he also becomes  camouflaged and gains  Unseen Predator for the remaining duration. His next basic attack within normal attack range against any enemy unit or with Unseen Predator against the nearest enemy champion deals 50% AD bonus physical damage and  reduces the target's armor for 4 seconds.

1.concerningText: Empowered Active: Savagery's bonus physical damage is modified and grants Rengar 50% − 101% (based on level)  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

0.concerningText: Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them for 1.75 seconds.

1.concerningText: Empowered Active: Bola Strike's physical damage is modified and  roots its target for 1.75 seconds.

0.concerningText: Active: Rengar activates his predatory instincts,  revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius and gaining  bonus movement speed for a duration.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

Keywords

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

Stats

+60 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Nightstalker: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Champion takedowns within 3 seconds reset this effect's cooldown and grant you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – NIGHTSTALKER: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and  slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Champion  takedowns within 3 seconds reset this effect's cooldown and grant you  invisibility for 1.5 seconds.

passive.originHTML:

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and restores mana equal to 40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and restores mana equal to 40% base AD (+ 16% bonus AD) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
